Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. This exceptional item is valued at $150 by both myself and you, ensuring a perfect match for your requirements. I am now extending you an exclusive opportunity to acquire this product at the same value, $150, making it a fantastic deal for you. Don't miss out on this chance to experience the quality and benefits this product has to offer. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $150. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $150
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $150
